name: Information
description:
Have you received yet another UNFAIR Parking Ticket???


THIS WILL AMAZE YOU: Be brave and don't let them win!

THIS IS THE SECRET THEY KEEP TO STOP YOU WINNING!


Whatever the many reasons for your unfair parking ticket/Penalty Charge Notice (PCN) payment can be avoided by using this tried & tested method that will literally only take you 10 minutes to complete and cost nothing more, aside from one first class stamp! No bull or long winded explanations or waffle designed to impress! It took us years to find a simple method that WORKS, but it really is as SIMPLE as this:


SOUND VERY FAMILIAR?

 - I only overstayed my Pay & Display ticket by a few minutes.
 - I only stopped on a yellow line for 5 minutes to unload.
 - I got a ticket in the post but don't remember a thing about it.
 - I didn't see any warning signs, parked and then got a ticket.
 - I thought you could park there in the evening, weekend or Bank Holiday.
 - I went to get change for the meter and came back to a ticket on my windscreen.
 - I bought a ticket, but it fell off my windscreen/dashboard.


BENEFITS: Kill that ticket/PCN.

Get results quickly & easily (can be used more than once) for a one off fee of ONLY £17.00

Remember parking tickets range from £50-60 and can double to £100-120 if not paid within 14-28 days.

This method is not unlawful and simply requires a short confirmation of the truth that does not involve taking up a Legal argument or long winded correspondence: One letter has killed it dead!


HOW TO PROCEED: Very Simple... and it 100% WORKS!


Simply click on the 'buy' link on our homepage, then add a copy of the letter to basket and follow the payment instructions.

Once paid (17.00) you will receive a return e-mail with full instructions and the 2 template letters. 

Prepare letter as instructed and post to authority concerned pronto. (eg. City Council.) It's THAT simple!


Any questions please e-mail:  stopparkingtickets@hotmail.co.uk


FACEBOOK

http://www.facebook.com/pages/Stop-Parking-Tickets/107999199323855?sk=info

name: Testimonial...
description:
This chap almost left it too late as the Council had obtained a Summons and Charging Order for over £100.00 against him. However, by using our system both were recently overturned by way of a simple (third & final) letter/defence to the 'Enforcement Section' of the bulk center at Northampton County Court as shown in this Court Order. 

It is very unlikely the Council will take any further action as they have now exhausted all their usual options and will not want to continue throwing good money after bad to crowbar payment out of him!

name: Testimonial 2
description:
IT SHOULD NEVER GET THIS FAR, BUT IF IT DOES:

Late in the day, another person successfully used our system to set aside a recent Summons and Charging Order for over £105.00 against him per this Court Order from the 'Enforcement Section' of the bulk center at Northampton County Court.

It is very unlikely the Council will take any further action as they have now exhausted all their usual options and will not want to continue throwing good money after bad to crowbar payment out of him!

name: Standard Disclaimer
description:
1. Alternative "solutions" offered by others on the internet are very legalistic, long winded and fraught with pitfalls.

2. We are not encouraging, condoning or suggesting parking illegally or irresponsibly. Unfair tickets are another matter.

3. We have every reason to believe this method will work for you based on our 100% track record, but of course cannot guarantee the outcome and so exercise your own judgement.

name: Buy
description: (Just add this to basket and check out)
